title: Find the Giraffe
description: Refresh the page to play again.
contents:
fill_vector <- function(item, size) { 
  size <- size*size
  tiger <- c(seq(1, size)) 
  for(i in seq(1, size)) { 
    tiger[i] <- item
  }
  tiger 
}
size <- 12
tiger <- fill_vector('ðŸ¯', size) 
tiger <- matrix(tiger, nrow=size, ncol=size)
#Pick a random position to have a giraffe 
giraffe_position <- sample(seq(1,size*size))[1]
tiger[giraffe_position] <- 'ðŸ¦’'
tiger

title: How to be an influencer
description: Post dancing tik toks and controversal tweets.
